item.title: How My XMonad Works
item.description: XMonad Configuration This is my personal configuration file for XMonad, a tiling window manager for X11. This configuration is highly customized and may not suit your needs out of the box, but you are welcome to use it as a starting point for your own configuration. Table of Contents Dependencies Installation Customization Variables Navigation Workspaces Startup Layout Keybindings Dependencies Before you can use this configuration, you will need to install the following dependencies:
